entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as being on a train home tomorrow.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: A house at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned as competing for the House Cup.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: A house at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned as competing against Gryffindor for the House Cup.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned as giving points to Slytherin.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry Potter's friends, mentioned as being locked out of Gryffindor Tower.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry Potter's friends, mentioned as trying to leave with Hermione.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: A portrait that guards the entrance to Gryffindor Tower, mentioned as going on a night-time visit.

entities.name: harry potter's friends
entities.description: Harry Potter's group of friends, including Ron and Hermione.

relationships.description: Hermione is locked out of Gryffindor Tower.
Professor McGonagall awarded points to Slytherin.
Harry Potter's friends are trying to leave from Gryffindor Tower.
